snippet: A show of works by the Turkish filmmaker Kutlug Ataman includes a feature-length narrative video, an enveloping multichannel installation and performance-based video loops.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews Kutlug Ataman: Mesopotamian Dramaturgies exhibition at Sperone Westwater gallery.
lead_paragraph: A show of works by the Turkish filmmaker Kutlug Ataman includes a feature-length narrative video, an enveloping multichannel installation and performance-based video loops.
